title: Machine Learning for Multi-Agent Problems
description: In 2026, I will join the College of AI at Tsinghua University as a tenure-track assistant professor. I am recruiting highly motivated students and research interns (undergrad and graduate). Contact me by email if you’re interested in the questions listed below.
description2: I completed my PhD at Harvard University, advised by Prof. David Parkes and Prof. Milind Tambe, and my M.E. at the Institute for Interdisciplinary Information Sciences, Tsinghua University.
problems: Economics of generative models--for example, how LLMs sell advertisements and how tokens are priced.
Principled deep learning methods for solving fundamental problems in microeconomics.
Modular control of a robot, treating each joint as an agent.
